1.2: You received a letter from the local wizard. He claims to have information regarding the old community centre.

3.3: Place 10 beetroot inside Mayor Lewis' fridge.

13.3: Visit the beach south of town before 17:00.

17.2: It seems that the lift in the mines is still functional. It will allow you to quickly return to any lift doors you've discovered. A deeper expedition might be in order.

21.2: Marnie came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrots are their favourite snack.

22.2: Jodi swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 19:00. Her only request was that you bring a largemouth bass for her fish casserole.

23.2: You found an ancient-looking object. Could it be some kind of artefact from long ago? Perhaps Gunther, curator of the local museum, has the answer.

24.2: Gunther asked if you'd consider donating any new artefacts or minerals you find to the museum. He says he'll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods.
24.3: Donate an artefact or a mineral to the museum.

25.2: There's something odd going on in the Community Centre...

100.2: Robin lost her favourite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch.

102.2: Mayor Lewis has lost his purple "shorts". He's asking you to find and return them... discreetly.

105.2: George needs a chilli pepper to soothe his aching knee.

110.9: Oh, my favourite stone! You're so sweet!$h#$b#Huh? It's from who?$u#$b#Oh, you got it at Clint's? Well I don't care where you got it from, it's beautiful! Thank you! *smooch*$h

126.2: Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fibre for a secret project.

127.2: Your wife is organising a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake.
